name: DIO & The World
author: Gemini
description: A high-power, high-ego deck focused on vampiric survival and overwhelming Stand strikes within stopped time.

cards.name: A Mere Monkey
cards.rulesText: Deal 3 damage to an adjacent enemy.

cards.name: Kono DIO Da!
cards.rulesText: Deal 1 damage to every enemy in a 3-hex burst.

cards.name: The Cairo Network
cards.rulesText: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, keep 1, and return the rest in any order.

cards.name: Checkmate
cards.rulesText: One opponent discards 1 random card and you teleport DIO up to 3 squares.

cards.name: Vampiric Regeneration
cards.rulesText: DIO heals 2 HP and removes one Bleeding token.

cards.name: Space Ripper Stingy Eyes
cards.rulesText: Deal 2 damage to an enemy within 6 squares.

cards.name: The World: Time, Stop!
cards.rulesText: DIO gains 1 additional action this turn.

cards.name: Shared Perception
cards.rulesText: Swap DIO and The World's positions if they are within 5 squares of each other.

cards.name: Stand Shield
cards.rulesText: The World gains Armor (reduce the next incoming damage by 3).

cards.name: MUDA MUDA MUDA!
cards.rulesText: Deal 3 damage to an adjacent enemy.

cards.name: Crushing Blow
cards.rulesText: Pull one target 3 squares toward The World and deal 1 damage.

cards.name: The Ultimate Stand
cards.rulesText: The World gains Focused (the next attack this turn deals +2 damage).

cards.name: Beyond Human Limits
cards.rulesText: Play when The World is attacked: cancel the attack and deal 1 damage back.

cards.name: The Greatest High
cards.rulesText: DIO heals 2 HP and both DIO and The World may move up to 2 squares.
